name: Soccer Gadgets
description: Soccer Gadgets is a 2D game based on the popular game Pong. The game can be played by up to two players, but it is possible to play alone against a computer controlling the opponent. The first player to score 3 goals wins the match. Soccer Gadgets has two game modes.. In the two-player mode, it is possible to play with a friend locally. Each player controls a character and the best player wins the match. In the single player mode, the player controls only the blue character and plays against a randomly moving computer that can use the gadget if it is obtained.
